title: Bruteforce Attack Lab
description: Test your skills with a bruteforce attack. Username: user, Password: Password123

levels.title: Bruteforce Attack
levels.content: In this level, your task is to perform a bruteforce attack to guess the password of the target user. The answer is the correct password you find.
levels.solution: Use a tool like 'hydra' to perform a dictionary attack on the target service with the desired username. For example: 'hydra -l target_user -P wordlist.txt target_service://target_ip:target_port'.

levels.title: Submit Bruteforce Result

questions.text: What is the password you successfully found using the bruteforce attack?

levels.instructions: Please answer the question with the password you successfully found using the bruteforce attack.
